```{r carcass count estimate}

#load data
data <- read.csv("data/LESP_carcasses_2022_TB_2023_07_31.csv")

#days between first and second collection
days1 <- 28-13

#days between second and third collection
days2 <- 29-28

#days between third and fourth collection
days3 <- (30-28)+14

#carcass estimate per collection day
thirteen_sept <- 50
tweight_sept <- 79+(70/2)
twnine_sept <- 15+(15/2)
fourteen_oct <- 24+(20/2)

#estimated number of moralities per night for each collection period
mort1 <- tweight_sept/days1
mort2 <-twnine_sept
mort3 <- fourteen_oct/days3

#average mortality 
mort_avg <- ((mort1 + mort2 + mort3)/3) #average 10.74167 birds per night

#average mortality during collection period minus collection nights (September 13 - October 14)
mort_avg_total <- mort_avg*28 #300 birds
```
